activities.title: Activity 1
activities.description: Complete this to proceed to the next level

questions.codingQuestion: Write a Python program that prints 'Hello, World!'
Write a Python program that prints 'Success!'
Write a Python program that adds two numbers and prints the result.
Write a Python program that multiplies two numbers and prints the result.
Write a Python program that prints the first 10 natural numbers.
Write a Python program that calculates the factorial of a number.
Write a Python program to check if a number is prime.
Write a Python program that prints the Fibonacci series up to 10 terms.
Write a Python program that reverses a string.
Write a Python program that sorts a list of numbers in ascending order.
Write a Python program to find the largest number in a list.
Write a Python program that removes duplicates from a list.
Write a Python program that counts the number of vowels in a string.
Write a Python program to convert a temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit.
Write a Python program to calculate the area of a circle given its radius.

activities.title: Activity 2
activities.description: Complete this to proceed to the next level

questions.codingQuestion: Write a Python program that prints 'Completed!'
Write a Python program that prints 'Next Step!'
Write a Python program that calculates the sum of the first 10 even numbers.
Write a Python program to check if a string is a palindrome.
Write a Python program that converts a list of integers to a comma-separated string.
Write a Python program that finds the GCD (Greatest Common Divisor) of two numbers.
Write a Python program that finds the LCM (Least Common Multiple) of two numbers.
Write a Python program to calculate the square root of a number.
Write a Python program that capitalizes the first letter of each word in a string.
Write a Python program to find the second largest number in a list.
Write a Python program that counts the occurrences of each word in a given sentence.
Write a Python program that merges two dictionaries.
Write a Python program to check if a given year is a leap year.
Write a Python program that removes all punctuation from a string.
Write a Python program to find the intersection of two lists.

activities.title: Activity 3
activities.description: Complete this to proceed to the next level

questions.codingQuestion: Write a Python program that prints 'Well done!'
Write a Python program that prints 'You're awesome!'
Write a Python program that calculates the sum of the first 10 odd numbers.
Write a Python program to reverse a list.
Write a Python program that converts a string to lowercase.
Write a Python program that finds the HCF (Highest Common Factor) of two numbers.
Write a Python program that finds the LCM (Least Common Multiple) of three numbers.
Write a Python program to calculate the cube root of a number.
Write a Python program that capitalizes all letters in a string.
Write a Python program to find the third largest number in a list.
Write a Python program that counts the occurrences of each character in a given string.
Write a Python program that merges two lists into a dictionary.
Write a Python program to check if a given number is an Armstrong number.
Write a Python program that removes all whitespace from a string.
Write a Python program to find the union of two lists.
